name: v0.2.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "with_cfg.bzl", version = "0.2.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "with_cfg.bzl",
    sha256 = "a9cb91cd63979c895003838d78a46e6a08d93fa3c03e75880633f09ac48322e3",
    strip_prefix = "with_cfg.bzl-0.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/releases/download/v0.2.0/with_cfg.bzl-v0.2.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update BCR repository metadata by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/39
* Update deps and move tools out of top-level BUILD file by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/41
* Recommend more Pythonic builder style by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/42
* Improve settings "did you mean" by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/43
* Fix BCR presubmit config by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/44
* Streamline README by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/45
* Update rules_java to 7.0.6 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/49
* Use `Label` in all `select` keys by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/48


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "with_cfg.bzl", version = "0.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "with_cfg.bzl",
    sha256 = "24e7496f06997e5dbfa1d788281d7fca95c60049a8bdf3250b4bb04c6151f9b0",
    strip_prefix = "with_cfg.bzl-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/releases/download/v0.1.0/with_cfg.bzl-v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update bazel-contrib/.github action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/7
* Rename to `with_cfg.bzl` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/6
* Add `toolchains` attribute to all targets by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/11
* Update actions/checkout action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/10
* Update dependency bazel to v7.0.0-pre.20230917.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/9
* Update bazel-contrib/.github action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/14
* Update dependency rules_cc to v0.0.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/12
* Only set explicitly provided attributes by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/16
* Remove `{}_deploy.jar` implicit target for `java_test` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/17
* Foward native Java providers and add `java_21_library` example by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/18
* Fix repo name in release configs by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/19
* Use `last_rc` for root module builds by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/21
* Fix type determination for (`select`s of) empty lists by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/22
* Speed up CI runs with flags by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/23
* Test with symlinks disabled on Windows by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/24
* Implement and use `map_attr` to determine select type by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/25
* Make implicit output patterns more flexible by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/26
* Ensure that the transition is always idempotent by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/27
* Add opt_filegroup example by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/29
* Update bazel-contrib/.github action to v5 by @renovate in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/28
* Rename example .bzl files and add select for runfile by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/31
* Add `cc_asan_test` example and fix idempotency check  by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/20
* Add `resettable()` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/5
* Add utility functions for location expression rewriting by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/34
* Remove workarounds for Bazel 6.4.0rc1 by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/35
* Add `reset_on_attrs()` by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/33
* Exclude ASan tests on Windows in BCR presubmit by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/36
* Add README and explain flag requirements in docs by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/37
* Fix release notes template by @fmeum in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/38

## New Contributors
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/7
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/pull/6

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fmeum/with_cfg.bzl/commits/v0.1.0
